TopicTitle: How do i make a space station vid tut would be nice

Articles.Content: can someone please teach me how to make a space station a video tut would be better but just posting it would be good
I'm not sure if I understand your question fully. Do you want to model a spacestation or put an existing one (is there?) in an orbit?

I want to know how to put one in orbit

srry for my bad english its my keyboard

The game currently has no way to put a space station in orbit. At best we can try getting a satellite in orbit, but it's still a manned mission.

The game is still very early in development but something like this will be possible in the future.

You can find the current list of planned features here:http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/index.php?title=Planned_features

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
